name: Zodiac
description: '''Zodiac''' ({{langx|ru|link=no|Зодиак}}, {{langx|lv|link=no|Zodiaks}}) was a [[Latvians|Latvian]] [[space disco]] band active in the [[Latvian Soviet Socialist Republic]] between 1980 and 1992. The band was extremely popular in the [[Soviet Union]] and has been credited by critics as the Soviet answer to the French band [[Space (French band)|Space]] who were popular at the time.
